page.content: {THE COACHBUILDERS. Mr.Bates is the manager of the coachbuilders.The firm make mobile homes,outside broadcasting units for thr BBC,trailers,demonstration vehicles and other specialist vehicles.They do not fit the engines themselves because they buy chassis cabs and trailers.You do not have to be a mechanic to build coaches.They work from Monday to Thursday 8 to 5,and on Friday 8 to 1.People sometimes do get injured,but only cuts and bruises.They do repair work on the vehicles.They have been building coaches for 50 years.The company employs about 38 men.The big coaches cost Â£100,000 and the small ones Â£15,000.This job involves much paperwork.Because you need to be skilled,you are paid very well.A large coach takes 3500 hours to build.
